name: Stealth Exit Strategies
description: Planning a calculated and covert exit from a psychopathic relationship to ensure safety and minimize fallout.

cards.title: Recognizing the Ideal Exit Window
cards.description: Identifying the safest moment to leave without escalating risk.
bulletpoints: Analyzing behavioral cycles to predict when they are most distracted.
Using planned misdirection to ensure they do not suspect the exit.
Leaving when they are at their weakest psychological state (not during rage cycles).

cards.title: Silent Resource Preparation
cards.description: Securing finances, documentation, and logistics without alerting the PSN.
bulletpoints: Using covert digital storage for important documents and emergency contacts.
Gradually shifting financial independence to prevent sudden suspicion.
Arranging safe locations and emergency contacts in advance.

cards.title: Psychological Disengagement Tactics
cards.description: Gradually reducing their psychological grip before making your move.
bulletpoints: Practicing emotional neutrality to avoid triggering suspicion.
Feeding them controlled false narratives to mask your true intentions.
Training yourself to resist guilt traps and manipulation before the exit.
